parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Acceleration in DCT Goldwing Motorcycles
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden and unintended acceleration can lead to accidents, injuries, and fatalities, especially in crowded areas like parking lots.
symptoms: The motorcycle surges forward without warning
even when the throttle is not being twisted
and the engine revs up rapidly. This can cause loss of control
accidents
and injuries.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unpredictable and early cancellation of turn signals can lead to confusion among other drivers, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The turn signal cancellation system turns off too soon
often before the turn is completed
and requires manual reactivation. This can cause confusion and safety hazards
especially in heavy traffic or intersections.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden stalling of the engine and loud clunking of the transmission can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, especially when stopping at intersections or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: The engine stops suddenly
often accompanied by a loud clunking noise from the transmission
and may not restart immediately. This can lead to safety hazards
especially when traffic behind the motorcycle is forced to brake suddenly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steering System Failure (Handlebar Stem Loosening/Spindle Failure)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause loss of control, leading to accidents or crashes, potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The handlebars become extremely loose at the stem
the spindle on which the handlebars pivot shears off
the handlebars are no longer connected to the steering system
and the vehicle is difficult or impossible to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The front wheel wobble can cause loss of control, leading to accidents or crashes, potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The front wheel wobbles at speeds above 40 mph
gets worse as speed increases
and feels unsafe at highway speeds above 60 mph.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended acceleration of the vehicle can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates suddenly and unexpectedly
often without warning lights or indicators
resulting in uncontrolled movement
such as surging forward
leaping
or jumping
even when the brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Acceleration due to Throttle Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The throttle malfunction can cause unintended acceleration, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The motorcycle accelerates independently without warning
the throttle sticks open
the RPM decreases without warning
the vehicle decelerates without warning.
